strings.STR_L_HTML5: This game uses HTML5. If it loads but does not run, please update your web browser.
strings.STR_WARNING_TITLE: Are you sure you want to leave Disney?
strings.STR_WARNING_TEXT: Disney does not control the website you are going to so please make sure you are happy to continue. Disney's privacy practices and controls do not apply once you leave our slte. lf you are a child reading this, please get your parent or guardian’s permission to continue.
strings.STR_WARNING_INTERNAL: Are you sure you want to leave the Star Wars Arcade?
strings.STR_SPIN_COIN: Spin the coin to get free tokens!
strings.STR_TICKER_NOSCORES: BE THE FIRST TO SUBMIT YOUR SCORE TODAY!
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_1: Navigate the arcade by clicking the arrows, or clicking and dragging with your mouse.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_2: Play games by clicking on the Arcade Machines.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_3: Here you can find high scores and all the latest Star Wars news!
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_4: Tap this door to customise YOUR Star Wars room.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_5: This is your Star Wars room. Decorate it using tokens you've earned by playing games.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_6: Tap the decorate button to begin customising your room.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_8: When you've finished decorating your room, click here.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_9: Your room also has a Trophy Cabinet.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_10: Tap it to see all the trophies you've earned!
strings.STR_WELCOME: Welcome to the Star Wars Arcade! Every day you’ll get rewarded with Tokens.
strings.STR_TUT_1: Welcome to your Star Wars Room. Earn tokens to decorate it!
strings.STR_TUT_2: Welcome! Let’s go on a tour.
strings.STR_TUT_3: Here is your Star Wars Room!
strings.STR_TUT_4: This is the Comms screen. For events, updates and other Star Wars news!
strings.STR_TUT_BUY_SPACESHIP: Click the green tick to buy The Ghost!
strings.STR_TUT_GOTO_ARCADE: Now let’s play some games! Click the door to go back to the Arcade.
strings.STR_TUT_PLAY: Have fun! May the Force be with you!
strings.STR_WookieWednesday: It's WOOKIEE WEDNESDAY! All in-game credits are worth double today!
strings.STR_TokenTuesday: It's TOKEN TUESDAY! All Arcade tokens are worth double today!
strings.STR_ForceFriday: It's FORCE FRIDAY! 25% Discount on all Star Wars Room items today!
strings.STR_SithSaturday: It's SITH SATURDAY - Welcome to the Dark side!
strings.STR_WookieWednesday_TIP: Did you know Sabine can run faster than the other Rebels in Team Tactics?
strings.STR_TokenTuesday_TIP: I’m terribly sorry to bother you, but you can increase your score in Yoda's Jedi Training by making Luke do flips
strings.STR_ForceFriday_TIP: Avoid damage in X-wing Fighter by keeping to the top or bottom of the screen
strings.STR_SithSaturday_TIP: Upgrade your Rebels abilities in Team Tactics to complete levels faster.
strings.STR_Halloween_TIP: Upgrade your ship in X-wing Fighter to get further and achieve a higher score.
strings.STR_Christmas_TIP: Collect Jedi coins to upgrade Luke and get further in Yoda's Jedi Training
